channel.title: Posts on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Blog

item.title: Arrays
item.description: In this blog, various operations on arrays have been explained with examples. Properties like rotation of arrays, searching elements in sorted and rotated arrays, shuffling operations, order statistics like finding kth elements under various constraints and queries on range of indices also have been explained with examples along with problem links from platforms like leetcode, wherever possible. Some basic optimization problems along with searching and sorting also been pen down and reference problems have been shared.

item.title: Basic Counting
item.description: Basic Counting methods using Permutation and Combination techniques. These are my classroom notes, which might be helpful to others. It starts from basic fundamental principle of counting and then move to elementary Permutation, Combination and their applications. Each section includes some basic problems for practice and illustrative examples for more complex topics. Some problems contains many sub-problems which helps in getting better insights for the concept / theory explained.
